  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(Server server, String id, GamePlatform gameModel, int expectedPlayers, String savePath)
      The game controller constructor.
      Parameters:
      server - The main instance of the server used for deleting a game.
      id - The id of the game.
      gameModel - The reference to the game model, that represent the game state.
      expectedPlayers - The number of expected player.
      savePath - The path to the location where the game will be saved.

    • GameController

      public GameController(Server server, String id, GamePlatform gameModel, int expectedPlayers, int round, String phase, String subPhase, Set<String> players, String savePath) throws AlreadyExistingPlayerException, FullGameException
      Game controller constructor user for restoring the game.
      Parameters:
      server - The main instance of the server used for deleting a game.
      id - The id of the game.
      gameModel - The reference to the game model, that represent the game state.
      expectedPlayers - The number of expected player.
      round - The number of the current round.
      phase - The current phase of the game.
      subPhase - The current subphase of the game.
      players - The list of players names who were present in the game.
      savePath - The path to the location where the game will be saved.
      Throws:
      FullGameException - Thrown when the game to which the user is attempting to log in is already full and active.
      AlreadyExistingPlayerException - Thrown when the user is attempting to log into a game that has already got an active player with the same chosen username.

  • Method Details

    • getExpectedPlayers

      public int getExpectedPlayers()
      This method returns the number of the player that will play the game.
      Returns:
      The number of expected player.

    • getGameModel

      public GamePlatform getGameModel()
      This method returns the reference to the game model.
      Returns:
      The reference to the game model, that represent the game state.

      public String getGameId()
      This method returns an alphanumeric id of the game.
      Returns:
      The game's id.

    • getPhase

      public Phase getPhase()
      This method returns the phase of the turn.
      Returns:
      The phase of the turn.

      public int getRound()
      This method returns the round number.
      Returns:
      The number of the round that is playing.

    • getSavePath

      This method returns the path where the game will be saved.
      Returns:
      The path to the location used to save the game.

    • getUsers

      public List<User> getUsers()
      This method returns the active users in the game.
      Returns:
      The set of the users that are online.

    • getUser

      public User getUser(String name)
      This method returns the user associated to the name in the parameter.
      Parameters:
      name - The username associated with the searched user.
      Returns:
      The User instance searched if present.

    • isEnded

      public boolean isEnded()
      This method tells if the game is ended.

      public GameControllerState getSubPhase()
      This method returns the gameController's current state (indicated by the subPhase).
      Returns:
      The subPhase attribute.

    • setSubPhase

      private void setSubPhase(GameControllerState state)
      This method is called whenever the gameController needs to change it's state, because of the execution of a certain command.
      Parameters:
      state - The state to set into the subPhase attribute.

    • getActiveUser

      public String getActiveUser()
      This method returns the user having the communication token.
      Returns:
      The activeUser attribute.

    • addUser

      public void addUser(String name, User user) throws FullGameException, AlreadyExistingPlayerException
      This method adds user to the data structures that contains the online users.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the user that will be added.
      user - The User that will be added.
      Throws:
      FullGameException - Thrown when the game to which the user is attempting to log in is already full and active.
      AlreadyExistingPlayerException - Thrown when the user is attempting to log into a game that has already got an active player with the same chosen username.

    • removeUser

      public void removeUser(User user)
      This method removes user from the data structures that contains the online users.
      Parameters:
      user - The that will be removed.

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      This method returns whether the game is full.
      Returns:
      True whether the game is full.

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame()
      Saves the current state of the game into a file.

    • writeFile

      private void writeFile(com.google.gson.JsonObject json)
      Writes the json containing the state into a file.
      Parameters:
      json - The json to write.

    • run

      public void run()
      This method is called whenever the game if full (players are all connected); it gives the input permission token to the current player, this decision is based on the turn order imposed by the model.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • planningPhase

      private void planningPhase()
      This method manages the planning phase.

      private void actionPhase()
      This method manages the action phase.

    • playAssistantCard

      public void playAssistantCard(String player, int assistant)
      This method updates the played assistant in game model.
      Parameters:
      player - The name of the player that played the card.
      assistant - The id of the card that tha player added.

    • moveStudent

      public void moveStudent(com.google.gson.JsonObject command) throws IllegalMoveException
      This method manages the movements of the student in the game.
      Parameters:
      command - The json with the directions of the movements.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if there are no students left.

    • moveStudentFrom

      private void moveStudentFrom(com.google.gson.JsonObject command) throws NoStudentException, IllegalMoveException
      This method is a helper for moveStudent method.
      Parameters:
      command - The json with the directions of the movements.
      Throws:
      NoStudentException - This exception is thrown whether there aren't students.
      IllegalMoveException - This exception is thrown whether the player tries to do illegal move.

    • moveStudentTo

      private void moveStudentTo(com.google.gson.JsonObject command) throws IllegalMoveException
      This method is a helper for moveStudent method.
      Parameters:
      command - The json with the directions of the movements.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - This exception is thrown whether the player tries to do illegal move.

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(int idIsland, boolean move) throws IllegalMoveException
      This method manages the movements of mother nature in the game and her consequences.
      Parameters:
      idIsland - The id of the island where mother nature will be set.
      move - true when mother nature has to be moved, false when it's used for resolving an island.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if one of the actions can't be performed.

    • motherNatureAction

      public void motherNatureAction(Island island) throws IllegalMoveException
      This method is a helper for moveMotherNature method.
      Parameters:
      island - The id where the mother nature action will be activated.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - This exception is thrown whether the player tries to do an illegal move.

    • chooseCloud

      public void chooseCloud(com.google.gson.JsonObject command)
      This method manages the choosing of the cloud.
      Parameters:
      command - The json with the information about the choosing of the cloud.

    • paySpecialCharacter

      public void paySpecialCharacter(com.google.gson.JsonObject command) throws IllegalMoveException
      This method manages the payment of the special character.
      Parameters:
      command - The json that contains all the information of the special character that will be paid.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if one of the actions can't be performed.

    • setBan

      public void setBan(int island) throws IllegalMoveException
      This method sets the second Ban.
      Parameters:
      island - The id of the island
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - This exception is thrown whether the player tries to do illegal move.

      Parameters:

      player - The name of the player.

    • checkStartCondition
